00014 #include "support.h"
00015 
00016 #include <kcmdlineargs.h>
00017 #include <kaboutdata.h>
00018 #include <kapplication.h>
00019 
00020 #include "kame.h"
00021 #include "xsignal.h"
00022 #include "icons/icon.h"
00023 #include <kiconloader.h>
00024 #include <kstandarddirs.h>
00025 #include <QGLFormat>
00026 #include <QFile>
00027 #include <QTextCodec>
00028 #include <errno.h>
00029 
00030 #include <ltdl.h>
00031 
00032 int load_module(const char *filename, lt_ptr data) {
00033     reinterpret_cast<std::deque<std::string> *>(data)->push_back(filename);
00034     return 0;
00035 }
00036 
00037 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00038 {
00039 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGCCPP
00040     //initialize GC
00041     GC_INIT();
00042     // GC_find_leak = 1;
00043     //GC_dont_gc
00044 #endif  
00045     const char *description =
00046     I18N_NOOP("KAME");
00047     // INSERT A DESCRIPTION FOR YOUR APPLICATION HERE
00048    
00049     KAboutData aboutData( "kame", "", ki18n("KAME"),
00050                           VERSION, ki18n(description), KAboutData::License_GPL,
00051                           ki18n("(c) 2003-2009"), ki18n(""), "", "kitag@issp.u-tokyo.ac.jp");
00052     KCmdLineArgs::init( argc, argv, &aboutData );
00053 
00054     KCmdLineOptions options;
00055     options.add("logging", ki18n("log debuging info."));
00056     options.add("mlockall", ki18n("never cause swapping, perhaps you need 'ulimit -l <MB>'"));
00057     options.add("nomlock", ki18n("never use mlock"));
00058     options.add("nodr");
00059     options.add("nodirectrender", ki18n("do not use direct rendering"));
00060     options.add("module <path>", ki18n("load a specified module"));
00061     options.add("+[File]", ki18n("measurement file to open"));
00062 
00063     KCmdLineArgs::addCmdLineOptions( options ); // Add our own options.
00064 
00065     KApplication *app;
00066     app = new KApplication;
00067   
00068     std::deque<XString> modules_core, modules;
00069     {
00070         KGlobal::dirs()->addPrefix(".");
00071         makeIcons( KIconLoader::global());
00072         {
00073             KCmdLineArgs *args = KCmdLineArgs::parsedArgs();
00074                     
00075             g_bLogDbgPrint = args->isSet("logging");
00076             
00077             g_bMLockAlways = args->isSet("mlockall");
00078 
00079             if(g_bMLockAlways) {
00080                 if(( mlockall(MCL_CURRENT | MCL_FUTURE ) == 0)) {
00081                     dbgPrint("MLOCKALL succeeded.");
00082                 }
00083                 else{
00084                     dbgPrint(formatString("MLOCKALL failed errno=%d.", errno));
00085                 }
00086             }
00087 
00088             g_bUseMLock = args->isSet("mlock");
00089             if(g_bUseMLock)
00090                 mlock(&aboutData, 4096uL); //reserve stack of main thread.
00091         
00092             QGLFormat f;
00093             f.setDirectRendering(args->isSet("directrender") );
00094             QGLFormat::setDefaultFormat( f );
00095             
00096             // Use UTF8 conversion from std::string to QString.
00097             QTextCodec::setCodecForCStrings(QTextCodec::codecForName("utf8") );
00098             
00099             QStringList module_path = args->getOptionList("module");
00100             for(QStringList::const_iterator it = module_path.begin(); it != module_path.end(); it++) {
00101                 modules_core.push_back(it->toLatin1().data());
00102             }
00103 
00104 #ifdef __SSE2__
00105             // Check CPU specs.
00106             if(cg_cpuSpec.verSSE < 2) {
00107                 fprintf(stderr, "SSE2 is needed. Aborting.");
00108                 return -1;
00109             }
00110 #endif
00111             
00112             FrmKameMain *form;
00113             form = new FrmKameMain();
00114             
00115             if (args->count())
00116             {
00117                 form->openMes( args->arg(0) );
00118             }
00119             else
00120             {
00121             }
00122             args->clear();
00123         }
00124     }
00125     /*
00126       while(!app->closingDown()) {
00127       bool idle = g_signalBuffer->synchronize();  
00128       if(idle) app->processEvents();
00129       app->processEvents(15);
00130       }
00131       return 0;
00132     */
00133     fprintf(stderr, "Start processing events.\n");
00134 
00135     app->processEvents();
00136 
00137     fprintf(stderr, "Initializing LTDL.\n");
00138     lt_dlinit();
00139 #ifdef __linux__
00140     LTDL_SET_PRELOADED_SYMBOLS();
00141 #endif
00142     QStringList libdirs = KGlobal::dirs()->resourceDirs("lib");
00143     for(QStringList::iterator it = libdirs.begin(); it != libdirs.end(); it++) {
00144         QString path;
00145         path = *it + "kame/core_modules";
00146         lt_dladdsearchdir(path.toLocal8Bit().data());
00147         fprintf(stderr, "searching for core libraries in %s\n", (const char*)path.toLocal8Bit().data());
00148         lt_dlforeachfile(path.toLocal8Bit().data(), &load_module, &modules_core);
00149         path = *it + "kame/modules";
00150         lt_dladdsearchdir(path.toLocal8Bit().data());
00151         fprintf(stderr, "searching for libraries in %s\n", (const char*)path.toLocal8Bit().data());
00152         lt_dlforeachfile(path.toLocal8Bit().data(), &load_module, &modules);
00153     }
00154 
00155     modules_core.insert(modules_core.end(), modules.begin(), modules.end());
00156     for(std::deque<XString>::iterator it = modules_core.begin(); it != modules_core.end(); it++) {
00157         lt_dlhandle handle = lt_dlopenext(it->c_str());
00158         if(handle) {
00159             fprintf(stderr, "Module %s loaded\n", it->c_str());
00160         }
00161         else {
00162             fprintf(stderr, "loading module %s failed %s.\n", it->c_str(), lt_dlerror());
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00166     int ret = app->exec();
00167 
00168     return ret;
00169 }
